page.title: 14SCHOOL LOG (1)
page.content: 1872Benington National School completed 1882 Sent four children home, not hav- ing brought the right amount of School Money. 1888 Received today a large package of new and beautiful books ... intended as the foundation of a Children's Library. 1890 The Rector very kindly sent down some soup and a piece of bread for each child this dinner-time. 1893 The family of ... having been ad- mitted to the Workhouse, removed from the Register. 1894 The frost is most severe, even the ink in the cupboard being frozen. 1900Older Scholar's Room is now crowded Our desks will not seat more than 78. 1910 A new wall with iron railings was built in front of the school. 1916 ... arrangements for the girls to make a number of flannel vests and shirts,also socks,mittens (Cont.)
